scripts.build: npm run bundle && uglifyjs turbine.js -mc --comments /^!/ > turbine.min.js && echo $(gzip -c turbine.min.js | wc -c)
scripts.test: budo test:bundle.js --live --dir test --title turbine -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --plugin tap-dev-tool
scripts.version: npm run bundle && npm run build && git add --all
